query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `documentChunks` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `documentId` int NOT NULL,
  `sectionId` int,
  `chunkIndex` int NOT NULL,
  `startOffset` int NOT NULL,
  `endOffset` int NOT NULL,
  `chunkSize` int NOT NULL,
  `overlap` int DEFAULT 0,
  `content` text NOT NULL,
  `contentHash` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `embeddingRef` varchar(128),
  `embeddingModel` varchar(64),
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `documentChunks_documentId_idx` (`documentId`),
  KEY `documentChunks_sectionId_idx` (`sectionId`),
  KEY `documentChunks_contentHash_idx` (`contentHash`),
  CONSTRAINT `documentChunks_documentId_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`documentId`) REFERENCES `documents` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  CONSTRAINT `documentChunks_sectionId_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`sectionId`) REFERENCES `documentSections` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2QJxepF6RkxixEF.root --database CrKBAyYZGWJki2G2dH59p7 --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `documentChunks` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `documentId` int NOT NULL,
  `sectionId` int,
  `chunkIndex` int NOT NULL,
  `startOffset` int NOT NULL,
  `endOffset` int NOT NULL,
  `chunkSize` int NOT NULL,
  `overlap` int DEFAULT 0,
  `content` text NOT NULL,
  `contentHash` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `embeddingRef` varchar(128),
  `embeddingModel` varchar(64),
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `documentChunks_documentId_idx` (`documentId`),
  KEY `documentChunks_sectionId_idx` (`sectionId`),
  KEY `documentChunks_contentHash_idx` (`contentHash`),
  CONSTRAINT `documentChunks_documentId_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`documentId`) REFERENCES `documents` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  CONSTRAINT `documentChunks_sectionId_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`sectionId`) REFERENCES `documentSections` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL
);
